thread.title: Policeman Killed, Inmates Freed in Attack on Bahrain Prison
thread.title_full: Policeman Killed, Inmates Freed in Attack on Bahrain Prison

author: webdesk@voanews.com (Reuters)
title: Policeman Killed, Inmates Freed in Attack on Bahrain Prison
text:
Policeman Killed, Inmates Freed in Attack on Bahrain Prison January 01, 2017 8:21 AM Reuters Print MUSCAT â€” 
Armed men attacked a prison in Bahrain on Sunday, freeing several convicts and killing a policeman, the Interior Ministry said. 
"An armed attack on the Jau reform and rehabilitation center resulted in the death of policeman Abdul Salam Saif and the escape of a number of inmates convicted of terrorist crimes," the ministry said in a statement. 
Thousands of mainly Shi'ite Muslim Bahrainis are in jail on charges ranging from participating in anti-government protests to armed attacks on security forces in the Western-allied Gulf kingdom, where the U.S. Fifth Fleet is based. Related
